ids_info.name: camera_ir
ids_info.description: Infrared camera for monitoring of Plasma Facing Components

Within frame container: Set of frames.

camera_ir/channel/camera/frame/integrati.documentation: Integration time per pixel. First dimension : row index (horizontal orientation). Second dimension: column index (vertical orientation). The size of this matrix is assumed to be constant over time. Allocate dimensions to 1 in case of uniform exposure time. Within camera_ir IDS: Infrared camera for monitoring of Plasma Facing Components. camera_ir/channel/camera/frame/region_of.documentation: Set of regions of interest for the real-time monitoring of machine protection. Within channel container: Set of channels (line of sight, viewing the plasma recorded by one or more cameras e.g. for different wavelength ranges). Within camera container: Set of cameras. Type of the region of interest usage, physical or operational. When operational, it means machine protection is active on this region of interest. Within camera_ir IDS: Infrared camera for monitoring of Plasma Facing Components. Mask of the region of interest on the frame (0 = point outside the ROI, 1 = point inside the ROI). First dimension : row index (horizontal orientation). Second dimension: column index (vertical orientation). Within camera_ir IDS: Infrared camera for monitoring of Plasma Facing Components. Within frame container: Set of frames. Within region_of_interest container: Set of regions of interest for the real-time monitoring of machine protection. Regions of interest are defined by a combination of polygons for each image.

Maximum allowed apparent temperature in the region of interest. A machine protection message is triggered if this limit is exceeded. camera_ir/midplane.documentation: Choice of midplane definition for the mapping of measurements on an equilibrium. Within camera_ir IDS: Infrared camera for monitoring of Plasma Facing Components.

options.name: magnetic_axis
options.description: Midplane defined by the height of magnetic axis equilibrium/time_slice/global_quantities/magnetic_axis/z

options.name: dr_dz_zero_sep
options.description: Midplane defined by the height of the outboard point on the separatrix on which dr/dz = 0 (local maximum of the major radius of the separatrix). In case of multiple local maxima, the closest one from z=z_magnetic_axis is chosen. equilibrium/time_slice/boundary_separatrix/dr_dz_zero_point/z

options.name: ggd_subset
options.description: Midplane location is specified by means of the GGD grid subset for the inner and outer midplanes, if the midplane choice is different from the other available options. If the GGD midplane subset corresponds to one of the other available options, select that particular option to indicate it

camera_ir/midplane/name.documentation: Short string identifier. Within camera_ir IDS: Infrared camera for monitoring of Plasma Facing Components. Within midplane container: Choice of midplane definition for the mapping of measurements on an equilibrium.

camera_ir/midplane/index.documentation: Integer identifier (enumeration index within a list). Private identifier values must be indicated by a negative index. Within camera_ir IDS: Infrared camera for monitoring of Plasma Facing Components. Within midplane container: Choice of midplane definition for the mapping of measurements on an equilibrium.

camera_ir/midplane/description.documentation: Verbose description. Within camera_ir IDS: Infrared camera for monitoring of Plasma Facing Components. Within midplane container: Choice of midplane definition for the mapping of measurements on an equilibrium.

camera_ir/frame_analysis.documentation: Quantities deduced from frame analysis for a set of time slices. Within camera_ir IDS: Infrared camera for monitoring of Plasma Facing Components.

camera_ir/frame_analysis/sol_heat_decay_.documentation: Heat flux decay length in SOL at divertor entrance, mapped to the mid-plane, this is the lambda_q parameter defined in reference T. Eich et al, Nucl. Fusion 53 (2013) 093031. Within camera_ir IDS: Infrared camera for monitoring of Plasma Facing Components. Within frame_analysis container: Quantities deduced from frame analysis for a set of time slices.

camera_ir/frame_analysis/distance_separa.documentation: Distance between the measurement position and the separatrix, mapped along flux surfaces to the outboard midplane, in the major radius direction. Positive value means the measurement is outside of the separatrix. Within camera_ir IDS: Infrared camera for monitoring of Plasma Facing Components. Within frame_analysis container: Quantities deduced from frame analysis for a set of time slices.

camera_ir/frame_analysis/power_flux_para.documentation: Parallel heat flux received by the element monitored by the camera, along the distance_separatrix_midplane coordinate. Within camera_ir IDS: Infrared camera for monitoring of Plasma Facing Components. Within frame_analysis container: Quantities deduced from frame analysis for a set of time slices.

camera_ir/frame_analysis/time.documentation: Time. Within camera_ir IDS: Infrared camera for monitoring of Plasma Facing Components. Within frame_analysis container: Quantities deduced from frame analysis for a set of time slices.

camera_ir/optical_element.documentation: Set of optical elements. Within camera_ir IDS: Infrared camera for monitoring of Plasma Facing Components.

camera_ir/optical_element/type.documentation: Type of optical element. In case of 'mirror' and 'diaphragm', the element is described by one 'front_surface'. In case of 'lens', the element is described by 'front_surface' and 'back_surface'. Within camera_ir IDS: Infrared camera for monitoring of Plasma Facing Components. Within optical_element container: Set of optical elements.

camera_ir/optical_element/type/name.documentation: Short string identifier. Within camera_ir IDS: Infrared camera for monitoring of Plasma Facing Components. Within optical_element container: Set of optical elements. Within type container: Type of optical element. In case of 'mirror' and 'diaphragm', the element is described by one 'front_surface'. In case of 'lens', the element is described by 'front_surface' and 'back_surface'.

camera_ir/optical_element/type/index.documentation: Integer identifier (enumeration index within a list). Private identifier values must be indicated by a negative index. Within camera_ir IDS: Infrared camera for monitoring of Plasma Facing Components. Within optical_element container: Set of optical elements. Within type container: Type of optical element. In case of 'mirror' and 'diaphragm', the element is described by one 'front_surface'. In case of 'lens', the element is described by 'front_surface' and 'back_surface'.

camera_ir/optical_element/type/descripti.documentation: Verbose description. Within camera_ir IDS: Infrared camera for monitoring of Plasma Facing Components. Within optical_element container: Set of optical elements. Within type container: Type of optical element. In case of 'mirror' and 'diaphragm', the element is described by one 'front_surface'. In case of 'lens', the element is described by 'front_surface' and 'back_surface'.

camera_ir/optical_element/front_surface.documentation: Curvature of the front surface. Within camera_ir IDS: Infrared camera for monitoring of Plasma Facing Components. Within optical_element container: Set of optical elements.

camera_ir/optical_element/front_surface/.documentation: Curvature of the surface. Within camera_ir IDS: Infrared camera for monitoring of Plasma Facing Components. Within optical_element container: Set of optical elements. Within front_surface container: Curvature of the front surface.

options.name: cylindrical_x1
options.description: Cylindrical in the X1 direction, use x1_curvature

options.name: cylindrical_x2
options.description: Cylindrical in the X2 direction, use x2_curvature

options.name: spherical
options.description: Spherical : same curvature radius in X1 and X2 directions, indicated in x1_curvature

options.name: toroidal
options.description: Toroidal : x1_curvature in X1 direction and x2_curvature in X2 direction

camera_ir/optical_element/front_surface/.documentation: Short string identifier. Within camera_ir IDS: Infrared camera for monitoring of Plasma Facing Components. Within optical_element container: Set of optical elements. Within front_surface container: Curvature of the front surface. Within curvature_type container: Curvature of the surface.

Within optical_element container: Set of optical elements. Within front_surface container: Curvature of the front surface.

options.name: cylindrical_x1

camera_ir/optical_element/thickness.documentation: Distance between front_surface and back_surface along the X3 vector. Within camera_ir IDS: Infrared camera for monitoring of Plasma Facing Components. Within optical_element container: Set of optical elements.

camera_ir/optical_element/material_prope.documentation: Material properties of the optical element. Within camera_ir IDS: Infrared camera for monitoring of Plasma Facing Components. Within optical_element container: Set of optical elements.

Type of optical element material. In case of 'metal' refractive_index and extinction_coefficient are used. In case of 'dielectric' refractive_index and transmission_coefficient are used. Within camera_ir IDS: Infrared camera for monitoring of Plasma Facing Components. Within optical_element container: Set of optical elements. Within material_properties container: Material properties of the optical element.

Short string identifier. Within camera_ir IDS: Infrared camera for monitoring of Plasma Facing Components. Within optical_element container: Set of optical elements. Within material_properties container: Material properties of the optical element. Within type container: Type of optical element material. In case of 'metal' refractive_index and extinction_coefficient are used. In case of 'dielectric' refractive_index and transmission_coefficient are used.

Integer identifier (enumeration index within a list). Private identifier values must be indicated by a negative index. Within camera_ir IDS: Infrared camera for monitoring of Plasma Facing Components. Within optical_element container: Set of optical elements. Within material_properties container: Material properties of the optical element. Within type container: Type of optical element material. In case of 'metal' refractive_index and extinction_coefficient are used. In case of 'dielectric' refractive_index and transmission_coefficient are used.

Within material_properties container: Material properties of the optical element. Within type container: Type of optical element material. In case of 'metal' refractive_index and extinction_coefficient are used. In case of 'dielectric' refractive_index and transmission_coefficient are used.

Wavelengths array for refractive_index, extinction_coefficient and transmission_coefficient. Within camera_ir IDS: Infrared camera for monitoring of Plasma Facing Components. Within optical_element container: Set of optical elements. Within material_properties container: Material properties of the optical element.

Refractive index (for metal and dielectric). Within camera_ir IDS: Infrared camera for monitoring of Plasma Facing Components. Within optical_element container: Set of optical elements. Within material_properties container: Material properties of the optical element.

Extinction coefficient (for metal). Within camera_ir IDS: Infrared camera for monitoring of Plasma Facing Components. Within optical_element container: Set of optical elements. Within material_properties container: Material properties of the optical element.

Transmission coefficient (for dielectric). Within camera_ir IDS: Infrared camera for monitoring of Plasma Facing Components. Within optical_element container: Set of optical elements. Within material_properties container: Material properties of the optical element.

Roughness parameter of the material. Varies in range [0, 1]. 0 is perfectly specular, 1 is perfectly rough. Within camera_ir IDS: Infrared camera for monitoring of Plasma Facing Components. Within optical_element container: Set of optical elements. Within material_properties container: Material properties of the optical element.

camera_ir/optical_element/geometry.documentation: Further geometrical description of the element. Within camera_ir IDS: Infrared camera for monitoring of Plasma Facing Components. Within optical_element container: Set of optical elements.

camera_ir/optical_element/geometry/geome.documentation: Type of geometry used to describe the surface of the detector or aperture (1:'outline', 2:'circular', 3:'rectangle'). In case of 'outline', the surface is described by an outline of point in a local coordinate system defined by a centre and three unit vectors X1, X2, X3. Note that there is some flexibility here and the data provider should choose the most convenient coordinate system for the object, respecting the definitions of (X1,X2,X3) indicated below. In case of 'circular', the surface is a circle defined by its centre, radius, and normal vector oriented towards the plasma X3.  In case of 'rectangle', the surface is a rectangle defined by its centre, widths in the X1 and X2 directions, and normal vector oriented towards the plasma X3. Within camera_ir IDS: Infrared camera for monitoring of Plasma Facing Components. Within optical_element container: Set of optical elements. Within geometry container: Further geometrical description of the element.

camera_ir/optical_element/geometry/centr.documentation: If geometry_type=2, coordinates of the centre of the circle. If geometry_type=1 or 3, coordinates of the origin of the local coordinate system (X1,X2,X3) describing the plane detector/aperture. This origin is located within the detector/aperture area. Within camera_ir IDS: Infrared camera for monitoring of Plasma Facing Components. Within optical_element container: Set of optical elements. Within geometry container: Further geometrical description of the element.

Major radius. Within camera_ir IDS: Infrared camera for monitoring of Plasma Facing Components. Within optical_element container: Set of optical elements. Within geometry container: Further geometrical description of the element. Within centre container: If geometry_type=2, coordinates of the centre of the circle. If geometry_type=1 or 3, coordinates of the origin of the local coordinate system (X1,X2,X3) describing the plane detector/aperture. This origin is located within the detector/aperture area.

camera_ir/optical_element/geometry/radiu.documentation: Radius of the circle, used only if geometry_type = 2. Within camera_ir IDS: Infrared camera for monitoring of Plasma Facing Components. Within optical_element container: Set of optical elements. Within geometry container: Further geometrical description of the element.

camera_ir/optical_element/geometry/x1_un.documentation: Components of the X1 direction unit vector in the (X,Y,Z) coordinate system, where X is the major radius axis for phi = 0, Y is the major radius axis for phi = pi/2, and Z is the height axis. The X1 vector is more horizontal than X2 (has a smaller abs(Z) component) and oriented in the positive phi direction (counter-clockwise when viewing from above). Within camera_ir IDS: Infrared camera for monitoring of Plasma Facing Components. Within optical_element container: Set of optical elements. Within geometry container: Further geometrical description of the element.

Component along X axis. Within camera_ir IDS: Infrared camera for monitoring of Plasma Facing Components. Within optical_element container: Set of optical elements. camera_ir/optical_element/geometry/x2_un.documentation: Components of the X2 direction unit vector in the (X,Y,Z) coordinate system, where X is the major radius axis for phi = 0, Y is the major radius axis for phi = pi/2, and Z is the height axis. The X2 axis is orthonormal so that uX2 = uX3 x uX1. Within camera_ir IDS: Infrared camera for monitoring of Plasma Facing Components. Within optical_element container: Set of optical elements. Within geometry container: Further geometrical description of the element.
